metadata.title: CVE-2017-8315 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Eclipse XML parser for the Eclipse IDE versions 2017.2.5 and earlier was found vulnerable to an XML External Entity attack. An attacker can exploit the vulnerability by implementing malicious code on Androidmanifest.xml.

notes.note: msalvatore> see debian CVE tracker for more details.

criterions.comment: apktool package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.4-1~18.04').
